page.title: 10FISHING IN LYMM
page.content: In Lymm there are three main waters which I fish in: the Bridgewater Canal, the Dam and the Tanner Pool. At Tanners Pool, which is fairly secret so not many people fish there, you can catch pike, perch and roach. To catch pike I use a spinner and no bait. For perch and roach I use maggots, worms and bread. My best catch is 4 perch in one hour. My best catch at the best place which is the farside from Highfield Road, about 2 metres from the side was a 24 pound pike. The Lymm Angling Club are in charge of the fishing on the Dam, and there are many special places called "pegs" where people sit to fish. Lymm Angling Club hold many fishing competitions. At the Dam peg 14 and 1 are the best.
